description:
"CAT AND CASTLE" is an exploration-based 2D action game with a nod to Metroidvania.
Explore a dreamy castle, acquire skills, and use gadgets to reach your goal.

■ Acquire skills by eating food
Moi-chan learns new skills by eating food. Choose the right skills according to the stage you're in.

■ A game themed around love for cats and peace
There are no enemies or traps attacking Moi-chan in this game. Enjoy delicious food and aim for the bed at the goal.

■ Simple controls for everyone to enjoy
Basic controls involve only movement and jumping. With straightforward gameplay, anyone can have fun. If you're good at action games, you can also enjoy replaying and aiming for the fastest clear time, searching for special treats hidden in each stage.

■ Irresistible for cat lovers!
In the game, Moi-chan's real footage and voice are used. Additionally, cute guest cats that were recruited make special appearances.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series CAT AND CASTLE
